title: User Login and Registration System
iWant: to securely create an account and log in with my credentials
soThat: I can access personalized features and my saved data

acceptanceTests.title: User Registration
acceptanceTests.description: Given a new user visits the registration page, when they provide valid email and password meeting security requirements, then an account is created and verification email is sent

acceptanceTests.title: Email Verification
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user receives verification email, when they click the verification link, then their account is activated and they can log in

acceptanceTests.title: Secure Login
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user with verified account, when they enter correct credentials, then they are authenticated and session is created with 24-hour expiry

acceptanceTests.title: Password Reset
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user forgot their password, when they request reset via email, then they receive secure reset link valid for 1 hour

acceptanceTests.title: Rate Limiting
acceptanceTests.description: Given a user makes 5 failed login attempts, when they try again, then their IP is rate-limited for 15 minutes
